directions: Arrange the lemon, lime, and orange slices in the bottom of a pitcher or punch bowl. Pour the gin over the fruit slices; cover. Refrigerate overnight.
Just before serving, pour the wine, orange juice, cranberry concentrate, tonic water, and pomegranate seeds into the gin; stir.
ingredients: ¼ cup frozen cranberry juice concentrate, thawed
¾ cup pomegranate seeds (from a fresh pomegranate)
